mapper.update: update enterprise set eid =#{enterpriseOld.eid}, ep_name =#{enterpriseOld.epName}, ep_short_name =#{enterpriseOld.epShortName}, ep_link =#{enterpriseOld.epLink}, ep_remark =#{enterpriseOld.epRemark}, ep_type =#{enterpriseOld.epType}, ep_status =#{enterpriseOld.epStatus}, create_time =#{enterpriseOld.createTime}, update_time =#{enterpriseOld.updateTime}, `delete` =#{enterpriseOld.delete}, collection_code =#{enterpriseOld.collectionCode} where eid =#{id}
